00002 #include <stdio.h>
00003 #include "EagleWorker.h"

00007 EagleWorker* EagleWorker_New(int workerId, struct EagleInstance_ *instance)
00008 {
00009     EagleWorker *worker = (EagleWorker*) malloc(sizeof(EagleWorker));
00010     worker->workerId = workerId;
00011     worker->instance = instance;
00012     return worker;
00013 }
00014 
00015 void* EagleWorker_begin(void *obj)
00016 {
00017     EagleWorker *worker = (EagleWorker*) obj;
00018     
00019     while(1) {
00020         EaglePlanJob *job = NULL;
00021         
00022         /* ask the instance for the next job */
00023         job = EagleInstance_nextJob(worker->instance);
00024         
00025         /* run the job is one is returned */
00026         if(NULL != job) {
00027             int i;
00028             
00029             /* run operations */
00030             for(i = 0; i < job->plan->usedOperations; ++i) {
00031                 EaglePlanOperation *epo = job->plan->operations[i];
00032                 
00033                 /* execute normal */
00034                 if(epo->type == EaglePlanOperation_NORMAL) {
00035                     epo->function(job->buffers[epo->source], job->buffers[epo->destination], epo->obj);
00036                 }
00037                 
00038                 /* execute page */
00039                 else if(epo->type == EaglePlanOperation_PAGE) {
00040                     EaglePage *page = job->buffers[*((int*) epo->obj)];
00041                     epo->function(job->buffers[epo->source], job->buffers[epo->destination], (void*) page);
00042                 }
00043             }
00044             
00045             /* extract records */
00046             for(i = 0; i < job->plan->pageSize; ++i) {
00047                 if(job->buffers[0]->data[i]) {
00048                     EaglePageReceiver_pushRecordId(job->plan->receiver, job->buffers[0]->recordOffset + i);
00049                 }
00050             }
00051             
00052             /* free */
00053             EaglePlanJob_Delete(job);
00054         }
00055         else {
00056             return NULL;
00057         }
00058     }
00059     
00060     return NULL;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void EagleWorker_start(EagleWorker *worker)
00064 {
00065     pthread_create(&worker->thread, NULL, EagleWorker_begin, worker);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void EagleWorker_join(EagleWorker *worker)
00069 {
00070     pthread_join(worker->thread, NULL);
00071 }
00072 
00076 void EagleWorker_Delete(EagleWorker *worker)
00077 {
00078     free(worker);
00079 }
